text.autoconfig.cheatdetector.title: CheatDetector Option
text.autoconfig.cheatdetector.option.ale: How many VLs should we space out before sending an alert?
Should we show alerts in chat when a player violates? (Only you will see it)
Should we send alerts to chat when abnormal packets are monitored?
text.autoconfig.cheatdetector.option.ant: If enabled, we will start counting player violations.
text.autoconfig.cheatdetector.option.ale: If the buffer is disabled, every alert will be displayed in chat.
text.autoconfig.cheatdetector.option.pac:
In order to avoid being flagged by an server-side anti-cheat error, should we fix some abnormal packets? 
This may affect the normal operation of some Mods, so please don't use it if you haven't encountered the error flag.

NORMAL: Fix some packets that may flag, most anti-cheats will not flag. 
STRICT: Fix all known packets that may flag, some features of the Mod are affected.
text.autoconfig.cheatdetector.option.ant: How much extra distance should we provide the player before marking?
text.autoconfig.cheatdetector.option.pac:
You need to have a trident containing the Riptide enchantment in your secondary handheld to disable movement detection. 
This module was designed for Vulcan 2.7.5 and doesn't seem to work with newer Vulcan. 
 Thanks to @§nCCBlueX§r .
